name: WallBender
description:
WallBender is a First-Person Dungeon Crawler game. 

Developed in Unity as submission for the "Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023" - https://itch.io/jam/dcjam2023

---- Lore -------------------------------------------------

You are a warrior who attended to a request from a spouse whom lost her husband in the forbidden maze.

Fight against enemies and solve puzzles to survive and, if possible, complete the spouse's task.

*Be careful, monsters likes to teleport.

---- Instructions -------------------------------------------------

  1. Movements: 
    1. Front: W;
    2. Back: S;
    3. Left: A;
    4. Right: D;
    5. Turn Left: Q; 
    6. Turn Right: E.
  2. Attack: Spacebar;
  3. Pickup Items: Left Mouse click;
  4. Use Items: Right Mouse click;
  5. Open/Close Sheets: Right Mouse click ON ITEM.

---- References -------------------------------------------------

All HD textures was freely collected at:

Polyhaven

Poliigon
